headline: CSX Corporation Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., May 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) announced that the Company’s Board of Directors approved a $0.13 per share quarterly dividend on the Company’s common stock. The dividend is payable on June 13, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 30, 2025.
